item.title: ItemOnItem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

Would anybody be so kind to setup a basic ItemOnItem method i dont care what ids you use all i need is the basic setup of it i can do the rest.

public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) { int usedWithSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWord(); int itemUsedSlot = c.getInStream().readUnsignedWordA(); int useWith = c.playerItems[usedWithSlot] - 1; int itemUsed = c.playerItems[itemUsedSlot] - 1; UseItem.ItemonItem(c, itemUsed, useWith);

Or at least be so kind to explain to me how i could come across making it myself with the above code i posted

Read full topic
